Everyone replying to your comment is failing to understand your joke. I am laughing at them.
(Facepalm) Oh my God.
HEY WAIT, UNCLE RYZE? RITO GAMS HAS HEARD OUR PRAYERS.

I looked up all the players that came up with these ideas and this is what I found.

Twisted Tea: Level 25 Unranked

ShadowCleave212: Level 30 Unranked

Your Shadow: Level 8 Unranked

I always thought you had to be some Challanger player or Diamond 1 player to get noticed by Riot but it turns out you don't even need to be ranked to get noticed.
That's awesome. Thanks for sharing, and kudos Riot for involving the little guys!
Good job reporting that and good job Riot for noticing the casual players and not just promoting the diamond+
lol (secretly they r all smurfs)
The relationship between being creative and being a Diamond 1 player does not compute {{champion:53}}
